rooms.name: Entrance Hallway
rooms.description: A spacious entrance with Vastu compliant direction for positive energy. Features a decorative foyer that sets the tone for the bungalow.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A large, open space designed in Bohemian style with eclectic decor and comfortable seating areas facing East to promote prosperity as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: An inviting dining space adjacent to the living room. The arrangement ensures easy movement and natural light from windows oriented towards the courtyard.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen designed with an open layout, featuring state-of-the-art appliances and a central island. Vastu guidelines suggest positioning it in the Southeast to promote harmony.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A cozy guest room with ample storage and calming color schemes, designed with Bohemian touches that reflect an artistic spirit.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master suite with a private balcony overlooking the central courtyard. Vastu principles encourage placing the master bedroom in the Northeast for energy balance and tranquility.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A dedicated home office designed to maximize focus and productivity, with ample natural light from north-facing windows as recommended by Vastu.
